sent.orig: Weekend attire is t-shirt, jeans, tennis shoes, or anything that's comfortable.
sent.trans: 周末爱穿牛仔裤、T-shirt、网球鞋及那些休闲舒适的衣服。

sent.orig: One wore a blue shirt, one a black shirt, and one a white shirt.
sent.trans: 一人身穿蓝色衬衫，一人身穿黑色衬衫，另一个穿白衬衫。

sent.orig: Such as SUIT, shirt, dog garment water-proof garment, jacket T shirt, sport garments etc.
sent.trans: 主要有西装，时装，狗装，雨衣，风衣，运动服装，等等服装。

sent.orig: I want the red checkered shirt starched. And I don't want the light blue shirt starched.
sent.trans: 这件红格衬衣需要上浆，这件浅蓝色的不需要浆。

sent.orig: Woman wearing a T-shirt Xiachang style more the men's wear company under the gowns shirt.
sent.trans: 女子穿上衣下裳式样的较多，男子多穿上下连属的袍衫。
